channel.title: US Government on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in US Government on PepsFeeder

item.title: This is how the people of the world came under the control of Google
item.description: New documents revealed that Google was collecting users' personal data through strategies similar to those used by Facebook, which violate the privacy of users and infiltrate their accounts and sell to companies, in order to improve its financial resources and increase revenue.
